title: Drawing, "Design for a Monogram: C.B.", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and brush and black ink, blue ink on cream illustration board
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right corner: C.B.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Monogram composed of a "C" formed by a black semi-circle surrounded by curved blue line conjoined with a "B" formed by a vertical blue line and two black semi-circles.
